title: When will my daughter get married? The details are her place of birth Agra (UP) time of birth 15:00 hrs 20aug1973. - Quora

response.answer_text: Birth Data :: - Female Date - 20/08/1973 ; Time - 03:00 pm Place - Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India Horoscope Informations :: Ascendant - Sagittarius Sun - Leo : 4R 03° 44′ Moon - Aries : 0R 20° 20′ ☆ Birthstar ☆ - Bharani Retrograde planet :: Jupiter Zero Rasis :: Cancer, Sagittarius Additional Informations :: Birthyogi : Mercury Sahayogi : Mars Avayogi : Mars Recommendations :: Things related to Birthyogi Mercury are : Gemstone - Emerald; Direction - North East; Colour - Green etc.. Wearing a Gemstone related to Birthyogi Mercury, Emerald fixed as open set in a ring suitable to wear in little finger will bring good fortunes through out the life period. Things related to Avayogi Mars are : Gemstone - Red Coral; Direction - South; Colour - Brown; Metal - Copper etc.. As for as possible try to avoid things related to Avayogi Mars to safeguard from ill effects. Rahu Mahadasha period from 17/02/2006 to 17/02/2024 Rahu - Venus period from 06/09/2017 to 05/09/2020 Answer to your quries :: D-9 chart, for married life, has Ascendant placed in Aries. Lord of Ascendant is Avayogi Mars and that made in delay. However Avayogi Mars is placed in Gemini. Avayogi placed in 3rd position is good. Further Jupiter is placed along with Ascendant ensuring good married life, although late. Lord of current Mahadasha period Rahu is placed in Cancer aspected by Birthyogi Mercury from Capricorn. Lord of current sub period Venus is placed in Pisces as exalted manner. Current Rahu - Venus period is favorable for marriage to take place. As Rasi of the native is Aries sometimes you would have been advised to wear Gemstone related to Mars, Red Coral. In some families ladies are advised to wear Gemstone Red Coral on health grounds. As Mars is Avayogi, avoid things related to Avayogi Mars. Vaasthu Tips :: Ensure that there is no water bodies like well, watering plants or trees, water tap, water can etc. in South East corner of the house plot as well as every room in the house. This will confer good health to the inmates of the house, especially ladies. Ensure that there is a window in Northern wall of your residence. This will enhance the flow of money and welfare of children. Ensure that there is no heavy weight objects placed in North East corner of the house plot as well as every room in the house. GOD BLESS YOU
Her time for marriage will start since July 2020. Tell her to use white colour in her dress and personal things. Contact me in Quora message for detail answer.
